content: A rectangular garden measures 15 meters by 20 meters. What is the area of this garden in square meters?

The area of a rectangle is calculated by multiplying its length by its width. In this case, the garden measures 15 meters by 20 meters. So, the area would be:

Area = length × width
Area = 15 m × 20 m
Area = 300 m²

Therefore, the area of the garden is 300 square meters.
